item.title: Apple to Launch New Low-Cost 11-Inch iPad in the Spring
item.description: Apple will launch a new 12th generation entry-level iPad in the spring of next year, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Apple is said to have two versions of the entry-level 11-inch iPad in develop
